news.headline: ICICI Bank Limited (IBN): One of the Best Emerging Markets Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds
news.text: ICICI Bank Limited (NYSE:IBN) stands out as one of the best stocks to buy according to Think Investments, a San Francisco-based investment firm. Think Investments, which focuses on long-term investments in both public and private companies, has over $1 billion invested in Indian companies. The firm's strategy is guided by Shashin Shah, who has decades of experience in global investing. Think's portfolio includes investments in various sectors such as financial services, healthcare, technology, and consumer sectors in India. Think's Q4 2024 13F filing showed that 80.57% of its top 10 holdings were in these sectors.

news.headline: ICICI's Q4 Earnings Increase Y/Y as NII & Fee Income Rise, Provisions Up
news.text: ICICI Bank's Q4 FY25 net income rose 18% to $1.5 billion due to increases in net interest income (NII), non-interest income, and growth in loans and deposits. However, higher expenses and provisions were challenges. The bank's NII grew 11%, and fee income rose 16%. Despite this, provisions increased by 24.1%, while credit quality showed improvement with a slight decrease in the non-performing asset (NPA) ratio. ICICI Bank's total capital adequacy ratio stood at 16.55%, with Tier-1 capital adequacy at 15.94%, both exceeding the minimum regulatory requirements.
